data.text:
m-Indicator is no.1 Pune & Mumbai Local Train Timetable.

It also provides bus information of BEST, NMMT, KDMT, MBMT, VVMT, KMT, TMT, PMPML.

1. Mumbai & Pune's Local train timetable -

- Central, Western, Harbour, Trans, Virar-Dahanu Shuttle, Diva-Roha, Neral-Matheran, Pune-Lonavala, Mono, Metro

- Along with starting train platform no. at Borivali & Virar & Kalyan

- Platform numbers & Door position

- Less crowded trains indication at Borivali & other stations during peak hours

- Mumbai Rail Map

- Nearby places in Mumbai

- 1st class & 2nd Class fares: ticket, monthly pass, quarterly pass

2. Bus Routes

- BEST, NMMT, TMT, KDMT, MBMT, VVMT, KMT , PUNE(PMPML)

-Get route by bus number

-Bus Timings

-Get buses arriving at particular bus stop

-Search buses between source and destination

3. Auto and taxi fare information

4. Classifieds section: Jobs & Properties from Mumbai

5. Natak Cinema

- Get daily schedule of Marathi, Gujrati, Hindi Natak (Drama)

6. Travel news & alerts

- Get weekly updated information of railway megablocks on Sundays

7. Emergency Telephone Numbers for

-Casualty Hospitals, Medical Financial Help (Trusts), Ambulances, Blood Banks, Railway, Air Lines, Fire Brigade, Electricity Issue, Cranes Services, Roadway Enquiries, Tourist Enquiries, Imp Medical Messages

8. Picnic Spots

-Get category wise list of picnic spots e.g. Beaches, Hill Stations, Waterfalls, Caves, Forts, Farmhouse, Resorts, Lakes

-Get distance wise list of various weekend picnic spots nearby Mumbai.

-Watch pics , read description and other information about spot

-Get updated list(Oct 2012) of MTDC approved budget hotels of all over Maharashtra

9. Get a push Notification for Mega block and other important alerts from m-Indicator.

People also lovingly call it as Mumbai Indicator.

M. Nanavati ,

Wrong Details updated

If youâll are giving the platform number, either give the correct platform number or just donât give one at all. I checked time for AC train from Vasai Road to Churchgate on your app. It said 4.33 AC local from platform no 5, and informed my parents accordingly, and the train came to platform no 3. We wasted our money on tickets we couldnât utilise at all.

Either give true platform number, or just donât give any detail at all, please donât put up wrong information at least.

Genuinely disappointed this time.

mitesh_z ,

App crashed frequently on IOS

The Mindicator app has been incredibly helpful for Mumbai commuters, providing valuable information and updates. However, recently, the app has been crashing frequently on iOS devices, which is frustrating. It was working fine for about 10-15 days, but now itâs become quite unreliable.

When it works, the app is nothing short of amazing, offering useful features and real-time information. Itâs undoubtedly one of the most helpful apps for commuters in Mumbai. However, itâs essential that the developers pay attention to the frequent crashes and work on seamless integration for iOS users.

Once the app is stable and free from crashes, it will be a top-notch tool for commuters. Iâm hopeful that the developers will address these issues and improve the appâs performance for iOS users, making it even more valuable and user-friendly.
